name: 勒内·笛卡尔
bio_short: 法国哲学家、数学家和物理学家，被誉为“现代哲学之父”。他发明了“解析几何”（笛卡尔坐标系），将代数与几何结合，并确立了光的折射定律（`descartes_optics_1637`）。
bio_short_en: A French philosopher, mathematician, and physicist, known as the 'Father of Modern Philosophy'. He invented 'Analytic Geometry' (Cartesian coordinates), bridging algebra and geometry, and established the law of light refraction (`descartes_optics_1637`).
